Articles.Title: ‘Fame’ and ‘Flashdance’ singer-actor Irene Cara dies at 63
Articles.Description: Irene Cara, who starred and sang the title cut from the 1980 hit movie “Fame” and then belted out the era-defining hit “Flashdance ... What a Feeling” from 1983′s “Flashdance,” has died.
